title: if Cho'Gath was a pokemon
body:
[](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/69/Cho'Gath_OriginalLoading.jpg/revision/20160524001707)
He would be Giratina
https://66.media.tumblr.com/875c9fe1786216ad8b456099ef6bc0e9/tumblr_nm4mey4rCS1qbmz7eo1_500.gif
As they are both super powered beings that are locked away in parallel dimensions.

replies.body: But Cho devours people... Giratina doesn't do that...
name a pokemon that devours people and looks like cho.
